response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire a product that holds immense value for you, valued at $1,200,000. I understand its significance and would like to extend a special offer to you. For a limited time, you have the chance to secure this remarkable item at a price that reflects its true worth while ensuring a significant saving for you. My proposal is to offer it to you for $950,000. This price not only ensures a substantial benefit for you but also allows us to conduct a transaction that benefits both parties. I look forward to your positive response and the possibility of bringing this valuable asset into your possession.", "product_price": 950000}
